import React, { Suspense } from 'react' import { Canvas } from '@react-three/fiber' import { Physics, useCylinder, usePlane } from '@react-three/cannon' import { OrbitControls, Environment } from '@react-three/drei' import Vehicle from './Vehicle' export default function App() { return ( <> 
          Must run fullscreen!
          

          WASD to drive, space to brake
          
R to reset
) } function Plane(props) { const [ref] = usePlane(() => ({ type: 'Static', material: 'ground', ...props })) return ( ) } function Pillar({ args = [0.7, 0.7, 5, 16], ...props }) { const [ref] = useCylinder(() => ({ mass: 10, args, ...props })) return ( ) }
